title: Kyiv Digital
description:
Kyiv Digital is a mobile application developed by the Kyiv City State Administration for residents and visitors of Kyiv. The app aims to provide a one-stop-shop for accessing various city services, information, and resources, making it easier for users to navigate and engage with the city.
The app includes a range of features such as the ability to pay for public transport tickets, utility bills, and fines, as well as access to information on city events, news, and weather updates. Users can also use the app to report issues such as potholes or broken streetlights, and track their progress until they are resolved.
Another useful feature of the app is its integration with the city's bike-sharing and car-sharing services, allowing users to easily locate and rent vehicles to explore the city. The app also offers a digital library of books, magazines, and newspapers, providing users with a convenient way to access reading material on-the-go.
Overall, Kyiv Digital is a valuable tool for anyone living in or visiting Kyiv, providing a wide range of features and services in a single, easy-to-use application. By streamlining access to important information and resources, the app helps users make the most of their time in the city and stay connected to its many offerings.
